sourcesContent: import { updateProfile, addPortfolioItem } from '@/services/api'; export default { name: 'FreelanceProfileView', props: ['currentUser'], data() { return { profile: { first_name: '', last_name: '', title: '', description: '', skills: [], hourly_rate: null, availability: 'AVAILABLE' }, portfolio: [], newSkill: '', loading: false, existingProfileId: null }; }, computed: { isFormValid() { return this.profile.first_name && this.profile.last_name && this.profile.title && this.profile.description && this.profile.skills.length >= 3 && this.profile.hourly_rate && this.profile.availability; } }, methods: { addSkill() { const skill = this.newSkill.trim(); if (skill && !this.profile.skills.includes(skill)) { this.profile.skills.push(skill); this.newSkill = ''; } }, removeSkill(index) { this.profile.skills.splice(index, 1); }, addPortfolioItem() { this.portfolio.push({ title: '', description: '', project_url: '' }); }, async saveProfile() { if (!this.isFormValid) { alert('Veuillez compl√©ter tous les champs obligatoires (au moins 3 comp√©tences)'); return; } this.loading = true; try { // ‚ö†Ô∏è S‚Äôassurer que existingProfileId est d√©fini pour updateProfile if (!this.existingProfileId) { alert("Impossible de mettre √† jour le profil : aucun profil existant"); this.loading = false; return; } const profileData = { ...this.profile, skills: this.profile.skills }; const response = await updateProfile(this.existingProfileId, profileData); if (response.data) { this.existingProfileId = response.data.id; } // Sauvegarde du portfolio for (const item of this.portfolio) { if (item.title.trim()) { await addPortfolioItem(this.existingProfileId, item); } } alert('‚úÖ Profil sauvegard√© avec succ√®s !'); } catch (error) { console.error('Erreur lors de la sauvegarde:', error); alert('‚ùå Erreur lors de la sauvegarde du profil'); } finally { this.loading = false; } }, async loadProfileData() { if (this.currentUser?.freelance_profile) { const profile = this.currentUser.freelance_profile; this.existingProfileId = profile.id; this.profile = { first_name: profile.first_name || '', last_name: profile.last_name || '', title: profile.title || '', description: profile.description || '', skills: profile.skills || [], hourly_rate: profile.hourly_rate || null, availability: profile.availability || 'AVAILABLE' }; this.portfolio = profile.portfolio_items?.map(item => ({ title: item.title || '', description: item.description || '', project_url: item.project_url || '' })) || []; } else { // Si pas de profil existant, cr√©er un profil vide c√¥t√© backend via updateProfile // Backend doit accepter la cr√©ation si le profil n'existe pas const response = await updateProfile(this.currentUser.id, {}); this.existingProfileId = response.data.id; } } }, mounted() { this.loadProfileData(); } };
